Our mission is your satisfaction. Just as our name suggests, Quality is our utmost consideration, which ensures that every job is done correctly at a competitive price. We only use industry approved materials and adhere to all local building codes and Provincial regulations

Your roof is the first and ultimate line of defence to protect your beloved home or business against the harsh elements of our unpredictable Canadian climate. profile:
Twin Peaks Roofing and Aluminum Inc. opened for business in 2006 with decades  of combined experience  in the roofing industry. Our company’s mandate since our inception has remained the same: provide our customers with quality roofing products and service at reasonable rates. We understand that if you are happy with our service, you will refer us to your friends and family; it is our pledge to our customers to work hard for your business.

For your safety and that of our employees, we are insured and have WSIB clearance. All our company vehicles are clearly marked and our team of roofing specialists are highly trained in the latest roofing safety equipment and techniques for your peace of mind.

Honest ~ Reputable ~ Affordable

Residential ~ Commercial

profile:
FANATTICS (formerly known as Titans RoofWorks) specializing in FAN's & ATTIC's!

Our attic insulation installations are performed from the exterior rooftop. This means our team's are keeping distance, keeping safe, and keeping the dirty equipment from entering your home (attic hoses are just gross!), thus, NOT disturbing your everyday. 
We’ll enter through your rooftop vent holes to perform the entire service, and exit through them just the same. We’ll then cap them off with your new roof peak vent system! The larger, upgraded roof peak ventilator's allow our team's to get the job done without entering your home.

Try FANATTICS and you'll notice even larger monthly saving's on your Energy bill, and a more comfortable living environment, while extending the life of your roofing materials and AC unit! Protect your new insulation purchase from attic condensation and dry rot when upgrading with affordable rooftop FAN solutions.

profile:
For over 15 years Smart Roofing Inc. has provided full service roofing for residential, commercial and industrial customers throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Our skilled, experienced craftsmen, aided by the reliable products, can accurately assess your roofing situation and expedite any job quickly and to your full satisfaction. 

We are dedicated to providing quality, professional installation and service commitment with fair prices. For your protection we are fully insured, bonded and licensed, and are proud members of the Better Business Bureau. We offer from 6 to 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship and only experienced crews of roofers are used. Smart Roofing has maintained these standards over the years and will continue to do such as our family of satisfied customers grows and shares their experience with peers, family and friends. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate or visit our showroom. At Smart Roofing Inc. "We protect what you value most". Make the SMART choice.
_____________________________________________

profile:
Imperial Roofs were awarded the Vaughan Citizen Readers Choice Award in 2011

In 1968 my father founded Cel Marchildon Roofing, which has grown into the company we have today.  Through commitment to excellence in our workmanship and materials we have built our reputation of TOTAL CUSTOMER SATISFACTION by providing our customers with the BEST ROOFING SYSTEM that will accommodate their needs and budget.  We will provide you, our valued customer, with a detailed assessment that will outline the specific requirements for your home. 

Our expert staff is committed to providing you with the BEST ROOFING EXPERIENCE available in the GTA.  All workers are covered by WORKERS COMPENSATION.  Our company is fully LICENSED AND INSURED to provide you with a WORRY FREE ROOFING EXPERIENCE.  We DO NOT USE ROOFING SUB-CONTRACTORS.  All work is performed by our expert employees. 

This may or may not be your first time purchasing a new roof, however we would like to outline some of the key factors in our operating process:

?	Provide a copy of our Insurance Certificate
?	Provide a copy of Workplace Insurance Safety Board Certificate upon request
?	Provide a copy of our Operating License 
?	Protect your home and surrounding area from falling debris
?	Tear off all old shingles to the roof deck
?	Inspect the wood deck for rotting and warping areas
?	Install eave protection to all insulated eaves 
?	Install name brand shingles with your choice 25 years to limited lifetime guarantee
?	Install proper ventilation to the roof (1sq ft for every 300 sq ft of attic floor area) 
?	Install new metal flashing where needed or refurbish to “new” standards
?	Install closed valleys with aluminum underneath to ensure maximum protection 
?	Full property clean up using magnetic sweeps and trailers to ensure no driveway damage
?	All employees are Fall Safety accredited and Crew Chief First Aid and CPR trained

Services We Provide:
*Asphalt Shingle Replacement
*Gutters, Soffit & Fascia
*Siding - Vinyl, Aluminum
*Leaf Screen for Eavestroughs
*Rooftop Snow & Ice Dam Removal
*Roof Repairs
*Roof Evaluations
*Cedar Shakes
*Slate Roofs
*Insurance Claims
*Ventilation Upgrades

profile:
Bros. Roofing has provided high-quality roofing services to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Bros. Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Bros. Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!
All our services are competitively priced and we provide educational information as well. 

You can count on us:
Most Affordable and Excellenct Roofing Service For You~~

profile:
We Are Still Open - COVID-19 Business Update
Now more than ever, we all play a part in keeping each other safe & healthy. With so much new information and so many sanctioned changes, all of us here at RoofRepairs.ca are committed to being a part of the solution. 
RoofRepairs.ca is deemed a company that provides essential services and we will continue to support & service homeowners with their roofing emergencies. With respect to the services we will continue to provide, our team has interpreted Premier Ford's release, with the understanding that homeowners still need repair work done to keep a safe & sanitary home to protect their families.
To that, we will continue to provide emergency repairs only, ones that will allow our people to remain a safe distance from one another and still provide a successful repair. At this time, until a means can be figured our, we will not be doing non-essential work, work that requires multiple people on site, nor will we be entering homes, which we usually do as part of complete investigation.
Please know that we will continue to help you as best we can while keeping everyone safe. We are a small business and our client's are at the heart of it all. My team & I are dedicated to working together in helping keep our community safe and healthy.
With Care,
Brad Wyatt
Owner of RoofRepairs.ca
specialities: We specialize in smaller and emergency requests
name: Roof Repairs.Ca

profile:
FAMILY OWNED FOR MORE THAN 60 YEARS
Since 1953, Cherry & Hoyle Roofing has been a successful family business, spanning over three generations while catering to the roofing needs of Oakville and the surrounding area. We are able to offer the highest standard of workmanship, customer service and saftey in the roofing industry.

When you give Cherry & Hoyle Roofing an opportunity to address your concerns about your roof, it starts with our professional sales team. Our sales staff are fully qualified to handle your concerns. Rest assured, that our sales team will give you an honest opinion, professional quote and a satisfied feeling that all of your concerns have been properly addressed and answered.

You've agreed to our estimate and now it's time for the installation of your new roof or repair. This is where our years of experience, the pride of workmanship, concern of saftey and the respect of your place of business or home is what our installer have to offer. Our crews are fully trained and have master certifications in multiple roof applications. Plus, with three generations of experience behind our crews, there isn't a problem we can not solve.

profile:
At Leading on Edge Roofing we strive to be complete in every aspect. Whether it be a repair, roof replacement or emergency service, our thorough attention to detail covers your roofing needs completely. We provide in house metal fabricating and have strategic alliances with electrical and plumbing contractors for a complete range of related services. Our insistence on safety training for our employees and in taking measures on-site means that your people and ours enjoy a safe working environment. Along with our reputation for honesty and standing behind our work, we believe in good communication so you know how your job is coming. Complete job, complete assurance, complete satisfaction.    

CLEAN:

Although Clean is not a word normally associated with the roofing industry, it describes our company in more ways than one. Our “clean site” program ensures your facility will be kept tidy for the duration of the job. We go the extra mile, pressure washing, sweeping, raking etc. to ensure that our customers are satisfied. And when it comes to relationships - clean means integrity. Its how we treat our suppliers, our employees and of course our customers. Rest assured that everything we do is responsible, legal and safe. In short, we care.

COSTS EFFECTIVE: 
At Leading on Edge Roofing we believe in fairness and respect. We only recommend the services you need. From a brand new roof to our annual service programs, we are committed to providing you with cost effective solutions to meet all your roofing needs! We choose only durable quality products for our experienced and efficient team to apply, ensuring your roof is done right. “Done right” means longer lasting. Now that’s saving you money and headaches.

profile:
Kingdom Roofing Limited is a team of expert roofers available 24 hours a day to install, repair or do maintenance to your roof. Kingdom Roofing Limited provides the highest quality workmanship, using top quality materials at affordable prices. We are committed to offer honest and professional advice to all our customers. We do not want to sell you a roof that you do not need, that is why our services include preventative maintenance and repairs. We will help you extend your roof service life and avoid costly roof replacements.

What do you get from working with Kingdom Roofing Limited?
 
    Professional assistance available to answer your inquiries at any time
    Affordable solutions for your roof improvement or new roof installation
    Detailed working plan including a dateline for finishing the project
    Expert roof installers to repair, maintenance or install a new roof on schedule
    A mess free home or business. We clean the job site and make sure you are satisfied with the end result.
 
Our services include
 
    Installation of new roofs
    Repairs (leak repairs, skylight repairs, chimney repairs)
    Maintenance (removing litter, cleaning gutters and drains for proper water flow)
    Storm damage and insurance workmanship
    Tear off, re-roofs and re-decking
    Three tab and architectural shingles
    Wood Shake and Flat Roofs
 
Commercial Services
 
    APP Modified Bitumen
    SBS Modified Bitumen
    BUR (Built up)
    Slate and Tile
    Expansion Joint Covers
    Edge Metal Systems
    EPDM-Rubber Roofing
    TPO & PVC
    Standing Seam Metal
    Shingle & Shake
    790-11 Hot Rubberized Asphalt
    Commercial Skylights
    Roof Vents & Vents

Our services include

    Installation of new roofs
    Repairs (leak repairs, skylight repairs, chimney repairs)

profile:
Vassa Enterprises offers homeowners a specialized one on one approach from beginning to end.  Owner and operator Tony Kavai will make sure you choose the right product at the right price.  Not having a sales team allows Tony to know first hand exactly what your expectations are and effectively make sure those expectations are delivered on.  Managing the sale himself also allows Tony to save you the hidden costs of commissions usually paid out to sales people, this he happily passes on to his customers.   To learn more about our product visit www.gerardusa.com

***
 
We offer you a quality stone coated metal roofing product manufactured by GERARD roofing technologies. This outstanding roofing material carries a limited lifetime warranty, which is not only transferable but also non-prorated. Whether your building is a residential house, apartment, commercial building, community house or a church, GERARD roofing tiles, shakes or shingles are the ultimate solution for your roofing need.
Gerard Stone Coated Steel, ‘Canyon Shake’ metal roof tile profile offers the best of all worlds for customers who want the look of wood shake with the strength and security of steel metal roofing.  Unlike wood shake, our premium stone coated steel roofing tiles will never need the costly maintenance, upkeep and replacement that natural wood shake roofs require.

***

Natural wood shake is not water proof, and needs to be maintained / treated for mold and fungus growth, and relies heavily on a vapor barrier underlayment to protect your roof deck. Our stone coated steel tiles are waterproof, and are categorized as a "dry under-deck" roofing system, keeping your roof deck dry year round under the most testing of conditions. With Gerard's stone coated tiles you won't need to treat for mold and fungus, and over the decades, your shake style roof will continue to look beautiful while delivering the best protection, as the day it was installed!
service_area: Toronto, Hamilton, Brantford, London, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph, Cambridge, New Hamburg, Port Colborne, Belleville, Barrie, Orillia, Muskoka, Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Brampton, Oshawa, Peterborough, St. Catharines, Niagara Falls, Greater Southern Ontario
products:
Steel Metal Framed Roofing, 
Owners of our stone coated steel roofing products will also enjoy insurance premium reductions thanks to the fact that our metal roof tiles will never burn or blow off as do conventional / natural wood shake tiles. Today, many areas across the US no longer allow natural wood shake roofs, and it is no surprise that Gerard's stone coated Canyon Shake metal roof tiles have become the preferred alternative.
services: Instillation of lifetime roof with a limited lifetime non-prorated and transferable warranty
brands: Gerard's Granite Ridge interlocking steel shingles are easy to install and deliver a lifetime of service and value to the home-owner. Related trims and job specific extrusions and moldings shorten installation times and deliver a fine finished look which you could not achieve with conventional roofing products.

profile:
George Kent first opened in 1949 and has since completed over 80,000 installations.  We offer home improvement services for  the entire Greater Toronto Area from Oshawa, to Newmarket, to Orangeville, to Burlington, including Oakville, Milton, Brampton, Woodbridge, Mississauga, Etobicoke and all of southern Ontario.  
With this many years of experience, our reputation speaks for itself.  We are the only home improvement company in the GTA that offers a lifetime warranty on the original installation for our windows and roofing.  In comparison, most box stores offer 1 year on the labour and our best competitors offer 5 years.

We specialize in:
* Windows: Enerview Window and Door Solutions, Vinylbilt, Neat Glass, Energy Star, ecoEnergy, Pella, Laminated Sound Reduction Glass
* Window Styles: Casement, Awning, Double Hung, Single Hung, Double Tilt Slider, Single Tilt Slider, Double Lift Out Slider, Single Lift Out Slider, Low Profile Fixed, High Profile Fixed, Custom Shapes, Greenhouses, Bay Windows, Bow Windows
* Doors: Steel & Fiberglass, Enclosures, Patio Doors, Garden Doors, Storm Doors, Entryguard Doors, Dorplex
* Roofing: Shingle roofing, Flat roofing, Tile roofing, lifetime roofing products
* Shingles: Camelot, Capstone, Grand Slate, Slateline, Timberline HD
* Insulation: Spray Foam, Attic, Basement, Roof, Blown Insulation, Exterior Wall Insulation, BASF, Owens Corning
* Siding: Vinyl Siding, Aluminum Siding, Gentek

profile:
Founded by Bruno Levesque in 1990, Let It Rain has grown from a single roofing contractor to become Mississauga, Toronto, and the GTA’s expert roofing company. Our business has grown because of our many customer referrals. At Let It Rain the quality of our work does the advertising for us. Our goal is to provide you with the most durable and energy efficient roof system by providing the best quality roofing in Toronto, Mississauga, Etobicoke and the Greater Toronto Area.  

Commitment To Quality:
Let It Rain is committed to continual research and development for all aspects of your metal, sloped or flat roof system. This includes shingles, ventilation and insulation. It is this unyielding commitment to quality that allows us to create the most durable and energy efficient roof for your home. We use custom parts and always make custom calculations to determine how we can maximize the life of your complete roof system. At Let It Rain we take pride in knowing that you are as comfortable under your roof as we are under ours. 

SERVICES INCLUDE:

Shingle Roofing:
Let It Rain installs a wide range of roofing shingles, including cedar, slate and fiberglass asphalt shingles. Let It Rain can replace your roof beautifully and ensure that it's guaranteed for life.

Roof Insulation & Attic Upgrades:
Installing a new roof is only as reliable as the insulation and attic underneath it. Let It Rain can not only replace your roof, but can make sure that it lasts a lifetime.

Aluminum:
To complement your roof installation, Let It Rain Roofing also installs aluminum siding, soffit, fascia, eavestrough and downpipes.

Flat Roofing:
Let It Rain offers flat roof installations and roof replacements for residential and commercial flat roofs.

Repair and Construction:
As a full service roofing contractor, Let it Rain offers roof maintenance and emergency roof repair in Mississauga, Toronto and the GTA.

Downspout Disconnection:
The city of Toronto’s Downspout Disconnection bylaw is now in effect. All Toronto homes must now disconnect downspouts from the city’s sewer system. See how Let it Rain can help you disconnect your downspouts.
services:
Shingle Roof:
At Let It Rain, we install a wide range of roofing shingles, including cedar, slate and fiberglass asphalt shingles. In addition to protecting your roof, our shingles can also improve the aesthetic value of your home because we offer a wide range of shingle colours and profile options.
Insulation & Attic Upgrades

Attic or ceiling insulation and roof ventilation are often ignored but have a large impact on the comfort of your home and the life of your roof. Without proper attic insulation and balanced ventilation, your attic will allow heat to escape, creating damaging moisture and ice build up. Let It Rain knows that attic insulation is an important part of the roof system. With a reliable and functional attic, Let It Rain ensures that your roof installation lasts a lifetime.
Aluminum

Let It Rain’s Aluminum Department offers a range of products and services to enhance the look of your home and protect it from the elements. Our suppliers provide aluminum for eavestrough, soffit and fascia in an array of colours to compliment your existing colour scheme.
Flat Roofing

Let It Rain installs flat roofs for both residential and commercial applications in Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton and all communities in the GTA.
Let It Rain’s Production Manager, Peter Dann, has over 30 years experience in the commercial and residential fields and our professional and courteous crews deliver the highest quality installations of flat roofing. 
Roof Repairs and Construction

Regular maintenance of your roof can extend its life and prevent costly interior damage. Let It Rain’s Repair and Construction department will assist you in resolving a range of roofing related problems on both shingled and flat roofs. Our service extends throughout Mississauga, Toronto and around GTA.

Mandatory Downspout Disconnection

The city of Toronto’s Downspout Disconnection bylaw is now in effect. All Toronto homes must now disconnect downspouts from the city’s sewer system.
specialities:
What you need to know:

The Roofing System consists of three components that should be balanced to work efficiently.

    The Shingled Roof acts as an umbrella shedding water and snow off the building.
    Insulation separates the attic from the house interior creating a comfortable home environment and reducing energy consumption.
    Ventilation moves cool air into the attic and hot air out. It extends the life of the shingles and provides a comfortable living environment

profile:
1 2 3 Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets 1 2 3 Roofing contractors apart.

We hold the accreditation of CertainTeed Shingle Master with CertainTeed St. Gobain, the world leader in shingle manufacturing. The stringent guidelines mandated by CertainTeed in the application of their product allows us to maintain the exceedingly high standards we are reputed for as roofers. 

123 Roofing services South Western Ontario, from Kitchener/Waterloo through, Hamilton, Halton, North York, Vaughan and into Barrie with sloped and flat roofing system replacements, eavestrough, skylight, shingles and attic insulation and ventilation work being our specialities.

Call today and one of our roofing systems consultants will be happy to help!

profile:
Sum-it Roofing contractors provide commercial roofing and residential roofing services in the GTA, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington and Milton

At Sum-it Roofing Inc., reliability, integrity and efficiency is our motto. Our fully licensed and insured commercial and residential roofers offer A+ roofing repairs or replacement at a fair and competitive price. We take pride in our work as we install the optimum roofing system to meet your budget. We are confident in our work that's why we are able to provide a 10yrs workmanship warranty. 
We strongly believe that a good roof comprise of more than just new shingles. Although it's important to select a durable roof shingles from a reputable manufacturer with a good warranty, Its equally important to have a proper underlayment paired with a high performance Ice & water membrane.
At Sum-it we create the perfect balance between cost efficiency and quality, Cheap is not our approach. With over 14yrs of roof installs we are ready to deliver what we do best, Roofs systems!

profile:
With over 30 years experience, Masonry Doctors are a leading masonry contractor in Toronto. Our services include Chimney Builds & Repairs, Roofing, Guttering, All Masonry Services, Patios, Walkways, Stairs, Steps, Basement & Foundation.

Browse through Masonry Doctors latest masonry, chimney, and concrete projects. Take a look at our recent work and see for yourself the quality of work we provide. Contact us today for a FREE estimate!

Do you need to have your existing outdoor masonry features repaired? Turn to the professionals from Masonry Doctors for all  your masonry restoration needs.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

If you love spending time outdoors, a patio is a must-have feature for your home. The team from Masonry Doctors can custom-design a patio for you.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Whether you have damaged concrete or a cracked foundation, the team from Masonry Doctors can repair it for you. Get 15% OFF our services.

Veneer facades and pillars can transform the appearance of any property. Trust us to upgrade your home with quality pillars and columns. Request a call back today!

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

profile:
At Impressed Roofing, we have served GTA area for a decade. It is hard to figure it out when you need to renew the roof. You may have many questions, such as what company should I choose? What kind of materials should I use? Is that cost in my budget? etcetera. 

 There are two sounds after new roofing installation. One is the roofing has done with good condition based on the good workmanship. This is reliable roofing company ; The other one is unreliable roofing company, they never come back when the roof job has done because the mess they done is not easy and cheap to fixed.

 Impressed Roofing is a reliable and trustworthy company. Quality roofing is primary target that we are focus on it. The employees are trained, certified and well cooperated because they have worked together for many years. 

We are friendly, professional guys and would like to answer all you questions. We also offer you a reasonable and affordable price. please feel free to contract us. The brand new roofing is going to be ready for you soon!

profile:
Tdot Roofers is most experienced & professional roofing company in Ontario.
Flat Roof
With a myriad of flat roofing systems available and more coming on stream every year, making the right choice is difficult & challenging for the uninitiated.

Shingles
We offer complete roofing services for domestic homeowners, from slate and tile to flat roofs, and everything in between; nothing is too small or large.

Repairs
From single site SMEs to national blue chip companies, our range of quality services can cope with any size of roofing project.with any size of roofing project

Inspection
We repair roofs of both commercial and residential establishments. Other than roofing repairs, we also work on roof inspections and complete re-roofing.
services:
Commercial Roofing
We offer extensive commercial roofing services including repairs and maintenance
We have highly skilled and professional commercial roofers.
We have the resources to provide emergency roof repairs and other related services for commercial property.
We pay a great deal of attention to even the smallest of details.
We follow safety measures and use safety equipment on site.
Skylight Installation
Cutting edge skylight technology
No problem installation
Reliable performance with a high degree of longevity
The best pricing you can find anywhere
Installation and repair of skylights

profile:
OUR STORY
Full Service Roofing Provide

TD ROOFING INC is fully licensed, insured to provide Commercial, Residential and Industrial services throughout Ontario. 
The fully certified Roofing professionals are able to complete anything from the most complex and large-scale construction projects to the smallest Roofing repairs.


At TD ROOFING INC we are driven by our commitment to excellence and always go above and beyond to make sure our clients are completely satisfied with our Roofing work. Our attention to details is what sets us apart from other companies in the business.

If you are looking for an Ontario Commercial, Industrial, Residential Roofing Company with experienced, well trained roofing professionals, where the owner is working first hand, shoulder to shoulder with all his team in every stage of the project, TD ROOFING INC is the right choice. We only use high quality materials and offer very competitive pricing.

We supply and install all of the following systems for flat, sloped and metal roofing:

Multi-ply (BUR/SBS)

Single-ply (TPO/PVC)

Shingles (asphalt/cedar/slate)

Residential metal work accessories

Metal Siding
services:
New Roof Construction

Roof Maintenance & Repair

Roof Replacement
specialities:
Asphalt shingles are the most commonly used system on sloped roofs. Asphalt shingles are in a wide variety of colors, styles and shapes. Asphalt shingles developments in durability and performance plus a professional installment ...

COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL

Built-Up Roofing system (BUR) is one of the oldest and most reliable commercial roofing systems. These roof systems often referred to as "tar and gravel" roofs. BUR consists of multiply plies of roof felts laminated together with bitumen ...

METAL SIDING

A residential roofing system must be outfitted with a metal soffit, fascia, eaves trough and downpipe. The soffit exists at the perimeter of the roof allowing air to pass through the roof structure for necessary ventilation. The fascia flashes the perimeter.

profile: At one point in their life, homeowners will have to deal with roofing problems, be it through repair and renovation or during the initial roof installation. It is one of those housing problems that are almost impossible to ignore for both the residential and commercial homeowners. Nobody would be comfortable living in a house with leaking or collapsing roof; it is not only dangerous to your life, your loved ones or your tenants, but also unhygienic and unhealthy. Also. there have been a lot of reported cases of tenants suing landlords/ladies for damages due to such eventualities, trust me you don’t want to be part of it. You, therefore, need a roofing partner who will always be there with you at every step of your home improvement process; that’s where Sparkle Roofing contractors come in.

profile:
Jim’s Roofing and Renovations Inc. is a family-owned and operated company located in Guelph. Our company has been serving the GTA and Hamilton area, as well as surrounding areas for over 30 years. Our installers specialize in all types of roofing applications - full installations as well as  repairs  with shingles, cedar, flat roofs, skylights, vinyl and aluminum siding as well as full trough installation. 

Our installers are up to date with the latest roofing technology to offer you the best products available. We are experienced in a variety of sloped roof applications such as Asphalt Shingles, Cedar Shake, Enviroshake and Slate Tiles. We also install a variety of skylights and sun tunnels. We are experienced in a variety of flat roof applications such as TPO, EDPM, Mod Bit, 4-Ply and Dec-Tec. We also have experienced installers for copper work, metal pans, eavestrough, fascia/soffit, as well as aluminum/vinyl siding and specialty siding such as Hardie Board, Maibec and cedar siding. Our service scope includes residential, townhouse complexes, condos, commercial buildings and industrial locations. All of our installers are certified in Working at Heights and follow all safety protocols to ensure a clean/safe work environment for everyone.  

For many years, Jim's Roofing and Renovations has had a successful partnership with numerous restoration and insurance companies.  Our role is to provide emergency services to home owners when unexpected damages occur as a result of wind and ice storms, fire and tree damage. 

From the initial contact for a free detailed no obligation estimate to the final steps of the installation and every aspect in between, Jims Roofing and Renovations strives towards working with you as the Homeowner to collaboratively meet your roofing and renovations needs and expectations.   Quality workmanship is a standard in our company and we stand by our written labour warranty and provide a manufacturer warranty for our clients.  

Working At Heights and Safety protocols are followed on all job sites.  Jim's Roofing and Renovations is fully covered under WSIB and carry Commercial Liability Insurance.  

We would like the opportunity to provide you with a free no obligation estimate for your roofing and renovation projects.

We’re a full-service roofing and landscaping contractor with more than 10 years working experience.

Our major roofing services include, but are not limited to:
- Free Estimate
- Roof repair and replacement
- Flat & shingled roofing
- Skylight repair and replacement
- Gutter & eavestrough repair and replacement
- Attic ventilation & insulation
- Chimney installation and repair
- Aluminum work

Our major landscaping services include, but are not limited to:
- Free Estimate
- Interlocking (driveway, pathway, entrance, patio, pool deck, etc.)
- Retaining walls
- Fencing (wood, vinyl, metal, etc.)
- Sodding & mulching

Our features:
• Full inspection
• Installation of high-quality materials
• WSIB guaranteed working place
• Licensed company
• Professional team
• High efficient work
• 15 years workmanship warranty for complete roof installation
• 2 years workmanship warranty for complete interlocking installation
• 24-hour maintenance response guarantee

profile:
Olympia Construction is an independently owned and operated Canadian business. Our employees are well trained in roof repairs and roof installations. We take pride in providing our customers with the best quotes, expert services and 24/7 support. Our services include an inspection, consultation and recommendations of the best material and methods for our customers roofing needs. Additionally, we provide emergency services in the event your roof has been damaged by a weather event, animals or natural wear and tear. Olympia Construction works close with homeowners, business owners and insurers. We protect our customers and our company with our liability insurance, WSIB coverage and our IICRC Certifications. 

By putting the needs of our customers first and treating their homes like our own, Olympia Construction can proudly say we are a valued partner in our community. 

Why choose us? Because, we do it just a little bit better.

profile:
Done Right Roofing and Sheet Metal has earned its reputation through 30 years of professionalism and quality installation in the Milton, Burlington, Oakville, Guelph, Halton Hills and Mississauga area.  We are GAF Master Elite Certified, WSIB Insured and fully licensed. Our crews attend Health and Safety training on a regular basis and have their Working at Heights Certification.   

Done Right Roofing offer’s a 10 year warranty on labour and workmanship and as a GAF Master Elite contractor we can offer 3 types of warranties direct from the manufacturer. 

Please contact us for commercial or residential needs at 905-875-288 or visit our website at www.donerightroofing.ca

Thousands of satisfied customers; references are available upon request.

FULLY LICENSED      FULLY INSURED      WSIB INSURED

Professional, Guaranteed Roofing Services from Done Right Roofing and Sheet Metal


Installation of Soffit, Fascia and eaves
Soffit and fascia have often been used for exterior trim. These items are easy to install, replace, when necessary, and can protect exposed wood from water damage.

Roof Evaluations
As homes and buildings become older, there comes a point where the life of a roof needs to be evaluated. . We determine the life expectancy of the current roofing system and decide if any repairs or replacements are necessary.

Maintenance & Repair
Done Right Roofing & Metal Sheet provides preventative roofing maintenance and roofing repair services in Mississauga, Milton, Oakville, Burlington, Guelph and Halton Hills. All repair and maintenance services are coordinated with you and/or your tenants and can be provided to you quarterly, semi-annually as well as annually.

Gutter Cleaning
The gutter is the most important part of your home, requiring on-going cleaning and inspection. We work to ensure that there are absolutely no leaves or debris remaining, which could clog and back up your roofing system.

Skylights
Adding a skylight is one beautiful way of accenting your home.

Flashing
Flashings are metal sheets, which are intended to direct water away from chimneys, vents, skylights, and eavestroughs.

Our professional roofers serve residential, commercial, and industrial customers throughout Markham, Richmond Hill, the Greater Toronto Area, and all of Southern Ontario.

Beyond being warrantied, bonded, and insured, Trudel & Sons Roofing Ltd is popular with GTA homeowners and businesses for our experience, competitive pricing, and award-winning service. All workers are covered under WSIB and you can expect to be treated with the utmost respect whenever you call for service.
***
While our photo gallery and roofing portfolio may give you a glimpse into the quality of our craftsmanship.  With close to 40-years of experience, we can help you decide on a roofing material that is right for your home and family.
***
Once you read our reviews and see our A+ Better Business Bureau rating, you’ll understand why more of the GTA’s homeowners and businesses choose our team!

profile:
Reayou Roofing is a team of specialist Torontonian roofers who understand the city’s weather and atmosphere. Their output is built to last harsh winters, as a result.

They’re also certified and insured. That matters because unlike plumbing, roofing is an unregulated industry.

Therefore, it’s vital to hire a team that is certified and insured. You wouldn’t want to end up paying more in repairs for a weak roof later!

Another positive point about them when it comes to cost-efficiency is that Reayou l doesn’t have unreasonable charges even for custom roofing. This is based on what we’ve seen of past project quotes.

And whether you need a new roof or your current one needs an upgrade, Reayou doesn’t shy away from any project, however complex. Their estimates are given free and upfront, so you’re not up all night worrying about how much this new roof is going to cost you.

There might be a chance that you don’t even need to get your roof replaced entirely, actually. Reayou doesn’t always push clients to spend on new roofing, especially if you’re a homeowner on a tight budget.

Pros

Affordable
Extensive services
Free quotes upfront
Works fast
name: Reayou roofing inc

profile:
Four Seasons Metal Roofing takes pride in providing quality metal roofing services and supplies to home owners and businesses in Ontario. With a combined experience of over 25 years, our sales professionals, roofers and engineers understand that a successful sale begins with creating a strong relationship with the client. We have learned that nothing is more valuable to you than a dry, warm and safe property. We strive to offer our clients a superior product, with skillful service. The 55 year warranty we offer, will ensure you never have to re-roof again. Our sales professionals will meet with you, answer your questions and thoroughly review your metal roofing system. We will offer you the best metal roofing solution for you, with a competitive market price. We offer more style, material and colour choices than any of our competitors. We manufacture all styles and profiles of metal roofing in Bowmanville, Ontario. Our roofers will install your metal roof in every season. Once your roof is completed, you will be delighted with the increase in value of your property, but also with the compliments from your neighbours! 

Four Seasons Metal Roofing is a family owned, Canadian company. Canadian's are always looking for a more sustainable green and clean product for their homes and businesses. Let Four Seasons Metal Roofing supply your eco-friendly roof, so you can start saving on your cooling and heating bills. 

Regardless of the size of your metal roofing system, you can expect a quality of service and product, which is what sets us apart from our competitors. To find out more about us visit our show room in Bowmanville, Ontario.


Four Seasons Metal Roofing Service Areas
Ajax, Barrie, Belleville, Bowmanville, Brampton, Brant, Brantford, Brockville, Burlington, Cambridge, Clarington, Cobourg, Cornwall, Dryden, Elliot Lake, Greater Sudbury, Guelph, Haldimand County, Hamilton, Kawartha Lakes, Kingston, Kitchener, London, Markham, Mississauga, New Castle, Niagara Falls, Norfolk County, Orillia, Oshawa, Peterborough, Pickering, Port Colborne, Prince Edward County, Quinte West, Sarnia, St. Catherines, St. Thomas, Stratford, Timmins, Toronto, Vaughan, Waterloo, Welland, Windsor, Woodstock
services:
Bond Roofing
A Bond metal roof offers extraordinary beauty and greater protection from the elements. Bond is ideal for retro-fitting over existing shingles. This will save time, labour and disposal costs, allowing Four Seasons Metal Roofing to offer affordable pricing.

Classic Roofing
With a 55 year warranty a classic Four Seasons metal roof is a smart decision for any home. This unique design and durable metal offer long lasting protection for your property, while greatly improving the attractiveness and curb appeal.

Grande Roofing
Grande is designed after the look of Dutch clay tiles. Four Seasons' Grande profile has a wave like pattern creating a distinctive European style with a modern system of protection. The offset pattern has a 17 mm step every 35cm that captures the light. A Grande metal roof is perfect for any home or cottage in Southern Ontairo.

Select Roofing
Select metal roof depicts a real slate or cedar shake roof. A 17mm step repeats every 35cm along the panel creating a defined appearance with far fewer seams. Select is ideal for any residence or commercial building in Toronto.

Integra Roofing
An Integra metal roof re-creates the classic Mediterranean clay tile appearance. With a 15mm step every 35cm along the panels, this roof suits a variety of applications from a sleek city home to a rural farm house.

Trapeze Roofing
Like all of Four Seasons' metal roofs, Trapeze can be installed over existing shingles. Trapeze is a simple sleek option which can be custom cut to suit any home or commercial building needs. A Trapeze roof is close match to the look of a Standing Seam roof.

Integra Cladding
Four Seasons Metal Roofing is committed to working with any size cladding or siding project. With 10 colours to chose from and several different finishes, your home or commercial building with a Four Seasons cladding solution will stand out from the rest.
specialities:
Canadian Made
The Four Seasons Metal Roofing manufacturing facility in Bowmanville, Ontario is the central station for all of our metal products' production. We are proud to be a Canadian company, making Canadian products.

profile:
GTA Roofing is a local contractor specializing in shingle re-roofing, new construction and roof repairs. We have over 25 years of combined experience and feel as though we have taken roofing to the next level. We complete each job with dedication and professionalism and are not satisfied until you are.
​
Servicing GTA and surrounding communities with complete roofing services, we guarantee high quality workmanship, honesty, reliability, and above all affordable rates. At GTA Roofing we strive for excellence while using today's most innovative and advanced proofing techniques, to ensure complete protection for your home against inclement weather. We are certified and experienced with all safety procedures, and take pride in all of our installations. We honor all of our warranties and have very high standards for customer satisfaction. We stand out from the rest, and your roof will too.
We realize that not everyone understands the roofing process. At GTA Roofing we will work with you to find the best solution to suit both your needs and your budget. We will educate you on your new roof installation and provide you with a piece of mind, while guiding you step-by-step throughout our entire process.
Our team is motivated, confident, skilled and offer expert service at all times. We have mastered our roofing techniques and take great pride in all of our installations.
Thanks !
